page.title: 12Religion in Knypersley.
page.content: The main church in the area is St.John's,Knypersley,which is an Anglican church.The churches of other denominations i.e.Pentecostal,Methodist and Roman Catholic,are outside this area but well attended.There are no facilities for any other religion other than Christianity. The average attendance of St.John's is 100 people,including family and evening service.Of the congregation 30% are over sixty years of age.The youth group has depleted in numbers recently to an attendance of seven.The church service is traditional,still using old prayer booksand hymns. Recently there has been a revival of all the churches,with their involvement in "Mission Biddulph",which aims to bring increasing youth involvement in the churches.
